resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104862</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104862</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206116</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Ask Dr. Global Change</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fragen Sie Dr. Global Change</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Demandez À Dr. Global Change</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pergunte A Dr. Global Mudança</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Chieda Al Dott. Global Change</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρωτήστε το Δρ Global Change</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pregunte A Dr. Global Change</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">offers a searchable collection of answers to questions about global warming, ozone depletion, greenhouse gases, and other issues related to climate change. Students can also submit questions of their own and explore related links.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">bietet eine auffindbare Ansammlung Antworten 
Fragen über das globale Wärmen, Ozon-Entleerung, Gewächshausgase 
an, und anderes gibt in Verbindung stehendes mit Klimaänderung 
heraus. Kursteilnehmer können Fragen von ihren Selbst auch 
eingeben und in Verbindung stehende Links erforschen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">offre une collection rechercheable de réponses 
aux questions au sujet du chauffage global, épuisement de l'ozone, 
gaz de serre chaude, et autre émet connexe au changement de climat. 
Les étudiants peuvent également soumettre des questions de 
leurs propres et explorer des liens relatifs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">oferece uma coleção searchable das respostas às
perguntas sobre aquecer-se global, depletion do ozônio, gáses da 
estufa, e outro emite relacionado à mudança do clima. Os 
estudantes podem também submeter perguntas do seus próprios e 
explorar as ligações relacionadas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">offre una collezione reperibile di risposte alle 
domande circa il riscaldamento globale, lo svuotamento dell'ozono, gas
della serra ed altro pubblica relativo al cambiamento di clima. 
Gli allievi possono anche presentare le domande dei loro propri 
ed esplorare i collegamenti relativi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προσφέρει μια εξερευνήσιμη συλλογή των απαντήσεων στις
ερωτήσεις για την παγκόσμια αύξηση της θερμοκρασίας λόγω του 
φαινομένου του θερμοκηπίου, τη μείωση όζοντος, τα αέρια 
θερμοκηπίου, και άλλα ζητήματα σχετικά με την αλλαγή κλίματος. 
Οι σπουδαστές μπορούν επίσης να υποβάλουν δικά τους τα 
θέματα και να ερευνήσουν τις σχετικές συνδέσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ofrece una colección investigable de respuestas a
las preguntas sobre calentarse global, agotamiento del ozono, gases 
del invernadero, y otro publica relacionado al cambio del clima. 
Los estudiantes pueden también someter cuestiones sus el 
propios y explorar conexiones relacionadas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206116</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104862</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/ask-dr-global-change</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
